title: Storms Over Secrets
description: Promises are lies dressed up for the party.Secrets poison the fairest of fairy tales.Lies stain the purest of loves.I've paid the ultimate price for my choices. The tendrils of those sins bind me to my past. The remnants of my love hold me captive.Then he walks into my life and makes me believe in second chances. He awakens feelings in me I know I shouldn't have. I yearn for a future without guilt. With him, I dream of a love untainted.Regret is a far reaching emotion. It barrels through time like a blazing comet, and its path isn't always straight. No matter what I feel, I cannot bring myself to regret the time I've spent with Cain.But it doesn't mean I can have him.My name is Celia Lemaire, and this is my story of broken promises.Storms Over Secrets is the third book of The Over Series, a group of interconnected stand alone novels. This book is a new adult romance. It is not intended for readers under the age of 18.
author: J.A. DeRouen
